__e: Stop him! He's with the resistance!
Colonel... you've given us the homing beacons, but you've also told us that China is overrun with japanese troops.
Now that the Japanese have perfected synthetic blood, which satisfies our needs there is no reason for anyone to fear us.
We've had the Japanese stay at our house ever since we arrived.
By the way, I heard the Japanese have retreated all the way back to Shanghai so even if you make it to the Chinese border, you may have difficulty catching up with them.
